sentences.en: A butterfly emerged in its full splendor a week later.
sentences.cn: 一周后蝴蝶破茧而出，绚丽夺目。

sentences.en: All Pen's splendor and magnificence vanished away at this.
sentences.cn: 这么一来,潘那豪华的气派,尊贵的表情,全不知去向.
他过着帝王般的豪华生活.

sentences.en: He went all - out in describing its splendor, beauty and delights.
sentences.cn: 他竭尽全力地描写它那令人观止的美景和赏心的乐事.

sentences.en: I can appreciate the ageless splendor of temples and museums and bridges.
sentences.cn: 我可以欣赏那些古色古香的庙宇,博物院和各式各样的桥梁.

sentences.en: The author tried to depict the splendor of the sunset.
sentences.cn: 作家试图摹写落日的光彩.

sentences.en: The castle rises in solitary splendor on the fringe of the desert.
sentences.cn: 这座城堡巍然耸立在沙漠的边际，显得十分壮美。

sentences.en: The house has been restored to its original splendor.
sentences.cn: 这座房子已经恢复了当初的光彩。

sentences.en: The kings of the earth will bring their splendor into the city.
sentences.cn: 地上的君王必将自己的荣耀归于那城.

sentences.en: The splendor of King Solomon passed anything before or since.
sentences.cn: 所罗门王的荣耀是空前绝后的.

sentences.en: The splendor of the Kingdom of Solomon was beyond anyone's imagination.
sentences.cn: 所罗门王国的壮观是任何人无法想像的.

sentences.en: The splendor of the palace dazed him.
sentences.cn: 王宫的富丽堂皇使他眼花缭乱.

sentences.en: There below lay Paris in all its splendor.
sentences.cn: 那下面就是光彩夺目的巴黎。

sentences.en: Title and fortune communicate a splendor all around them.
sentences.cn: 爵位和财产会给予周围的人一种光彩.
